CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 10, 1965, pg. 5 reads: "Jazz Workshop - Walt Harper (seated at piano, left), well-known jazz artist, completed the second series of his "Jazz Workshop" last Tuesday at Kramer's Backroom, in Pittsburgh before an enthusiastic packed house. in background (right) is Erice Kloss, blind 15-year-old sax genius, who was Walt's guest artist.  He is surrounded by the Harper Quintet.  Nate Harper, tenor sax, and Jon Morris, trombone.  At extreme left is Bobby Boswell, bass.  Standing at right is Dr. Alton Kloss, father of the guest artist.  In the audience (left with hand to cheek) is Mrs. David Lawrence, wife of former Governor of Pennsylvania David Lawrence. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Walt Harper playing piano in front of audience in Kramer's Backroom
